#summary Mozilla Firefox extension project requirements.

= Introduction =

This document is a draft on requirements and ideas on how to add Sakha ЙЦУКЕН keyboard layout to "Transliterator", a Firefox extension. 


= Details =

 # Open firefox configuration editor (type about:config in the location field), then filter the preferences by "transliterator".
 # Right-click on the configuration editor, choose New -> String, enter the name extensions.transliterator.layouts.sah, hit enter, paste your transliteration table (see below).
 # Right-click and add new string again, this time enter extensions.transliterator.layouts.sah.description and a name for your transliteration table, e.g. "Сахалыы ЙЦУКЕН"

= Transliteration table =

We need five extra symbols over the Russian ЙЦУКЕН

 * 4 ҥ
 * 5 ҕ
 * 6 ө
 * 7 һ
 * 8 ү

Here is the string value:

{{{
[["`","ё"],["~","Ё"],["@","\""],["#","№"],["1","?"],["2","'"],["3","%"],["4","ҥ"],["5","ҕ"],["6","ө"],["7","һ"],["8","ү"],["$","Ҥ"],["%","Ҕ"],["^","Ө"],["&","Һ"],["*","Ү"],["9",";"],["0",":"],["q","й"],["w","ц"],["e","у"],["r","к"],["t","е"],["y","н"],["u","г"],["i","ш"],["o","щ"],["p","з"],["[","х"],["{","Х"],["]","ъ"],["}","Ъ"],["|","/"],["a","ф"],["s","ы"],["d","в"],["f","а"],["g","п"],["h","р"],["j","о"],["k","л"],["l","д"],[";","ж"],[":","Ж"],["'","э"],["\"","Э"],["z","я"],["x","ч"],["c","с"],["v","м"],["b","и"],["n","т"],["m","ь"],[",","б"],["<","Б"],[".","ю"],[">","Ю"],["/","."],["?",","]]
